text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Sie.please extend..lockdown..in Chennai so many affected, but. Now so many sectors are opened by TN cm. They not values. peoples, economy down, so we opened like this media says, but if no peoples left, then how government runs ?. Please make strong discussion against. Covid-19
